Viking’s shortfalls just seem so peculiar when compared to the surging competency of its strengths. [May 2008, p.90]
It’s a mix of exciting and overwhelming as you try to maintain what feels like 50 pots boiling over at different times.
A decent sequel to the first game that is ultimately mired by an intolerably imbalanced career mode.
